Let me know if this helps, and if you need any more assistance.

author: CJ Mikucki
text:
I am looking for municipalities (10k-50k residents, preferred) who have developed or used best practices of revenue sustainability, that is, the ability to meet the expectations currently as well as in the future with existing resources.  It would be greatly appreciated if anyone has any supporting documents that help better understand the process by which administrators gathered and used information to develop a budget plan with sustainable revenues.  
Many thanks in advance.
title: Revenue Sustainability Best Practices
